location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Sketch Map of the Beida district of Yemen

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Manuscript; coloured ink and pencil on paper.Dimensions: 329 x 187mm.

mods.abstract: This sketch map shows the Beida [Al Bayḑāʼ] district in Yemen and the surrounding regions. The Beida district, which is marked as being under Zeidi [Zaidi] occupation, is highlighted by a dotted red line.
